object.name: verifyUser
object.description: Verifies a user on behalf of the organization which is represented by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Verifies a user on behalf of the organization which is represented by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Verifies a user on behalf of the organization which is represented by the bot. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: Custom description for the verification; 0-70 characters. Must be empty if the organization isn't allowed to provide a custom verification description.
annotations.html_description: Custom description for the verification; 0-70 characters. Must be empty if the organization isn't allowed to provide a custom verification description.
annotations.rst_description: Custom description for the verification; 0-70 characters. Must be empty if the organization isn't allowed to provide a custom verification description.
annotations.name: custom_description
